metadata.title: CVE-2017-7376 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in libxml2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrarycode by leveraging an incorrect limit for port values when handlingredirects.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7376` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.3
libxml2-utils - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.3
python-libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.3').
